channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 09:19 Alarm lifted in Rivne region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 09:19 Alarm lifted in Rivne region. Follow further messages. #Rivne_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 09:12 Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community - Miriv Territorial Community - Pokrov Territorial Community - Chervonogrigoriv Territorial Community
